extension.description: halibut Skin is a modded Estuary version for use with halibut 2.0 or higher. It attempts to be easy for first time Kodi users to understand and use and it integarates halibut and it's Trakt Collection based on your own Trakt Account. Thank you to phil65 for his original code.
